threads.title: Party at the candy kingdom tomorrow
In search of a new guitar

posts.text: Has anyone checked on the lich recently?
I'll stop by and see how he's doing tomorrow!
Come party with the candy people tomorrow!
I need a new guitar to play the most savory licks in Ooo
